questionTitle: Dear Charles I thought it was ____ time I wrote to you and told you what I've been up to.
My main news is that Mary has at long last ____ to marry me.
She puts it another way and says she will be able to make an____ man of me.
And now I come to a very important ____ I want to ask of you.
Putting it____ I should be delighted if you would agree to be my best man at our wedding.
I can____ you that the duties are not in any way complicated .
In fact you could not possibly say that the job of best man is at all____ .
This brings me to another point: why aren't you and Sara tying the____ ?
After all why should you two continue to be free and I have to give up my____ ?
Let me have your ____ as soon as possible.Your old friend, Mick.
